GlassFish v2 Code Dependencies

The majority of GlassFish v2 code is available under a Dual License consisting of the Common Development and Distribution License (CDDL) v1.0 and GNU Public License (GPL) v2 for both the source and binary forms. This page contains details about the components in GlassFish and the licenses under which they are covered. You must agree to all of these licenses as part of the installation before viewing and/or using the code.
